## StepComponentProps.hideInput property

Indicates that the input table should be hidden or else shown and editable by the user. It may be desirable to hide this if the modal is launched directly from a table, which would make display redundant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hideInput?: boolean;
```
